Descriptions.club: it is your chess club dashboard. here you can manage your players, events and other club settings
Descriptions.tournaments: here are all the tournaments related to you. both, where you played and which were organized by your clubs
Descriptions.about us: mktour is an open-source project. here you can learn more about team and the app
Descriptions.profile: it's your own page with all your clubs, stats and more

Descriptions.all clubs: explore clubs and their events, join new communities
Descriptions.new club: create new chess club right here
Descriptions.FAQ: learn how to use all mktour's cool features
Descriptions.contact: reach us with questions, ideas, hiring offers and whatever else

Empty.players: there are no players in this club yet
Empty.tournaments: there are no tournaments in this club yet

Profile.noClubs: not a member of any club yet

Player.claim confirmation: you are gonna send application. as soon as admins confirm it, player will be associated with your account
Player.cancel affiliation description: you are going to disconnect your account from this player

Stats.h2hEmpty: no games against other players yet

Errors.short club name: too short for a chess club name
Errors.long club name: too long for a chess club name
Errors.short tournament name: too short for a tournament name
Errors.lichess team connected: sorry, this team is already here:
Errors.name: what's their name?
Errors.min nickname length: nickname must be at least 3 characters long
Errors.max nickname length: nickname must be at most 30 characters long

Settings.name: name
Settings.confirmation body: all players and tournaments will be deleted. if you're completely sure, type the name of the club you are deleting
Settings.no affiliated users: couldn't find users related to your club. start typing to search among all mktour users

Notifications.empty: claims to moderate tournaments, to link players to users and other club related notifications

Notification.affiliation_request_rejected: {user}'s request to link with {player} was rejected
Notification.affiliation_cancelled: {user} cancelled their request to link with {player}

New.name: name
New.description placeholder:
tell something about your club...

p.s it's useful to mention here, how to contact admins
New.club not saved: sorry! server error happened, club wasn't saved

forward to empty.message: it seems that you have a club with no finished tournaments: {club}. you can just edit it!

New.club not created: sorry! some error happened. the club wasn't created

Toasts.ws error: live-server error. sorry! you will see no realtime updates
Toasts.user deleted: your profile has been deleted completely
Toasts.zero clubs error: every user must have at least one club
Toasts.tmt-not-started error: first you need to start the tournament to then set game results
Toasts.ws message error: sorry! realtime server couldn't forward this event to other viewers
Toasts.player has tournaments: sorry! the player, who is added to a tournament, cannot be deleted. otherwise you have to delete that tournament too

UserSettings.name: name
UserSettings.confirmation body: this confirmation will immediately delete your profile completely. there is no way back! if you're completely sure type your nickname below
UserSettings.checkbox2: delete every club i own (with all players)
UserSettings.do it yourself: you have to do it yourself

Tokens.description:
api tokens allow you to make authenticated requests
to mktour api. it gives full access to your account
Tokens.name: name
Tokens.modal description: this token will only be shown once. please copy it and store it securely. you will not be able to see it again.
Tokens.modal warning: warning: this token gives full access to your account. do not share it with anyone.

Main.confirmation body: all results and scores are going to be deleted. the tournament will get to 'not started' state

Delete.title: delete tournament
Delete.confirmation body: the tournament will be permanently deleted

Round.add two players: add at least two players to see generated round

start tournament.title: start tournament?
start tournament.description: you have to start tournament before saving results

Table.added players error: sorry! couldn't get added players from the server

AddPlayer.name: name
AddPlayer.possible players error: error happened while loading club players
AddPlayer.no players:
nobody here yet!
go add some new people

Tournaments.no tournaments: you don't have any tournaments yet

MakeTournament.server error: sorry! server error happened, couldn't make tournament
MakeTournament.name: name

Home.big text 2: organize any chess tournament the easy way

TeamJoinToaster.user refused: too bad... we hope you join us one day!
TeamJoinToaster.joined successfuly: yeee, now you're in the team!
TeamJoinToaster.toast message: in case you experience any difficulties while using our app, please describe the problem at <lichess>our lichess team </lichess> forum. do you want to join the team, where you can reach us any time?

GlobalSearch.search dialog description: here you can find any club, tournament or mktour user

About.title: about mktour
About.intro: mktour is a free, open-source platform designed to make organizing chess tournaments simple and efficient. built by chess enthusiasts, for chess enthusiasts.

features.title: features
features.tournaments: create and manage various tournament formats
features.clubs: organize players and track club statistics
features.players: comprehensive player profiles and performance tracking
features.realtime: live updates and real-time tournament progress

opensource.title: open source
opensource.description: mktour is completely open source and available on github. contributions, bug reports, and feature requests are welcome!

contact.title: get in touch
contact.lichess_desc: join our community and get support

User.removed from club managers: you were removed from club managers
